QuestData.Title: Put That Baby in the Cradle!
QuestData.Description: Och!$b$bYou an' junior took yer sweet time gettin' 'ere, din't ya!?$b$b$gDrinkin' ale:Holdin' hands;, takin' in the sights, I'll wager.$b$bDon't go breakin' yer arm pattin' yerself on the back now, the real work's just beginnin'!$b$bThere be more ta this ancient artifact than ye know, but in order ta reveal its secrets, we need ta get it to the Cradle of the Ancients!$b$bNow howdya spose we do that?$b$bMaybe junior over there has some bright ideas, eh?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Harrison Jones at the Temple of Uldum.
QuestData.RewardText: Of course I have a plan for moving the coffer.$b$bSomeday, maybe the old coot will learn to trust me.
